member.name: M:HasTransactions
member.returns: True if are transactions opened or false if not

member.name: M:TransactionCount
member.summary: Gets a value representing the number of opened transactions.

member.name: M:GetWarnings
member.returns: An ArrayList object with the server Warnings.

member.name: M:AddWarning(FirebirdSql.Data.INGDS.GDSException)
member.summary: Adds a warning to the list.
member.param: An GDSException object representing the Warning.

member.name: M:CheckValidity
member.summary: Checks if Db Handle is invalid or not.
member.exception: IF Db handle is not valid.

member.name: M:Invalidate
member.summary: Closes all streams and the socket and inavlidate the db handle.

member.name: P:Rbd_Id
member.summary: Gets a value representing the Database handler ID.

member.name: P:DbSocket
member.summary: Gets an object with the Socket used for connect to Firebird Server.

member.name: P:DbNetworkStream
member.summary: Gets an object with the NetworkStream used for send/receive data from a Firebird Server.

member.name: P:Output
member.summary: Gets an object with the XdrOutputStream used for send data to a Firebird Server.

member.name: P:Input
member.summary: Gets an object with the XdrInputStream used for receive data from a Firebird Server.

member.name: P:IsValid
member.summary: Return a value indicating if the database handle is valid or not.
member.value: true if db handle is valid or false if not.
